ygData.subject: Re: [Digest Number 83]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Are there levels of faction above Warmly? no warm is the highest there is. ... will raise faction with FP militia? I d like a list of any quests and/or
ygData.messageBody:
>Okay, that's what how I think things work. Now for a couple of questions:
Are there levels of faction above Warmly?

no warm is the highest there is.

> Quest wise: is there anything left besides turning in deathfist belts that
will raise faction with FP militia? I'd like a list of any quests and/or
kills that will raise faction with that group? Lowering faction with the
knights is fine, since just killing orcs will raise it again.

unsure about this

Also, as I plan to be a world traveler, are there any kills that will
increase faction with vendors/guards in Grobb or Oggok that won't too
seriously damage faction with the smaller races?

no clue

Finally, on the CHA raising end, does the Leatherfoot Raider Quest really
require D'Vinn's Dragoon Dirk as it appears? Or are there just plain
"dirks" found on other dragoons that will work?

D'vinn's is usually the easiest to get, but any dragoon dirk will do.
Dragoon Zytl in West Commons also drops one.

>Thanks in advance.

You are welcome :)
